languages.text:
"Но не дано нам менять плетенье судьбы,
Фенриса дети жаждали смертного боя".

"But it is not given to us
to change fate's weaving.
The children of Fenris hungered
for mortal combat."
languages.original_text:
"Но не дано нам менять плетенье судьбы,
Фенриса дети жаждали смертного боя".

traits.locale_text:
"But it is not given to us
to change fate's weaving.
The children of Fenris hungered
for mortal combat."

"But it is not given to us
to change fate's weaving.
The children of Fenris hungered
for mortal combat."

"Но не дано нам менять плетенье судьбы,
Фенриса дети жаждали смертного боя".

"But it is not given to us
to change fate's weaving.
The children of Fenris hungered
for mortal combat."

languages.text:
「しかし、運命の行方は
我々の手では変えられない。
フェンリスの子供たちは
死闘に飢えていた」
languages.original_text:
"But it is not given to us
to change fate's weaving.
The children of Fenris hungered
for mortal combat."

traits.locale_text:
「しかし、運命の行方は
我々の手では変えられない。
フェンリスの子供たちは
死闘に飢えていた」

languages.text:
“但我们无权改变，
女神所编织的命运。
芬里斯的子嗣渴望，
赌上性命的战斗。”
languages.original_text:
"But it is not given to us
to change fate's weaving.
The children of Fenris hungered
for mortal combat."

traits.locale_text:
“但我们无权改变，
女神所编织的命运。
芬里斯的子嗣渴望，
赌上性命的战斗。”

languages.text:
« Mais il ne nous est pas donné
d'altérer la trame du destin.
Les enfants de Fenris
au combat mortel aspiraient. »
languages.original_text:
"But it is not given to us
to change fate's weaving.
The children of Fenris hungered
for mortal combat."

traits.locale_text:
« Mais il ne nous est pas donné
d'altérer la trame du destin.
Les enfants de Fenris
au combat mortel aspiraient. »

languages.text:
«Mas no nos corresponde
cambiar los designios del destino.
Los hijos de Fenris ansiaban
un combate decisivo».
languages.original_text:
"But it is not given to us
to change fate's weaving.
The children of Fenris hungered
for mortal combat."

traits.locale_text:
«Mas no nos corresponde
cambiar los designios del destino.
Los hijos de Fenris ansiaban
un combate decisivo».

languages.text:
"Doch es ist uns nicht gegeben,
das Weben des Schicksals zu verändern.
Die Kinder von Fenris gierten
nach Kampf bis zum Tod."
languages.original_text:
"But it is not given to us
to change fate's weaving.
The children of Fenris hungered
for mortal combat."

traits.locale_text:
"Doch es ist uns nicht gegeben,
das Weben des Schicksals zu verändern.
Die Kinder von Fenris gierten
nach Kampf bis zum Tod."

languages.text:
"Fakat kaderin ağlarını
Bize düşmez sökmek.
Açtı Fenris'in çocukları,
Ölümcül çatışmanın tekine."
languages.original_text:
"But it is not given to us
to change fate's weaving.
The children of Fenris hungered
for mortal combat."

traits.locale_text:
"Fakat kaderin ağlarını
sökmek düşmez bize.
Fenris'in çocukları açtı,
ölümcül bir çatışmaya."
